capability.name: Investment Portfolio Analysis
capability.definition: Assess and report on investment portfolio make-up, valuation and performance
capability.role: Perform scheduled and ad-hoc performance analysis on a customer's investment portfolio. This can include different types of analysis and performance comparisons
capability.example: A relationship manager requests an investment portfolio performance analysis prior to a regular client meeting

key_features.name: Consolidate investment portfolio transaction details and comparative market activity reports
key_features.description: Enables consolidate investment portfolio transaction details and comparative market activity reports to support assess and report on investment portfolio make-up, valuation and performance

key_features.name: Select types of performance analysis and apply analyses to the period of transaction data
key_features.description: Enables select types of performance analysis and apply analyses to the period of transaction data to support assess and report on investment portfolio make-up, valuation and performance

key_features.name: Develop portfolio performance comparisons and evaluations/justifications
key_features.description: Enables develop portfolio performance comparisons and evaluations/justifications to support assess and report on investment portfolio make-up, valuation and performance
